info.description:
The purpose of this documentation is to provide developers an insight of how to
interact with Mysterium Node via Tequila API.
This should demonstrate all the possible API calls with described parameters and responses.
info.title: Tequila API

get.description: Returns list of access policies

post.description: Authenticates user and issues auth token
Authenticates user and sets cookie with issued auth token

get.description: Returns default configuration
Returns default configuration
Returns current user configuration

post.description: For keys present in the payload, it will set or remove the user config values (if the key is null). Changes are persisted to the config file.

parameters.description: configuration keys/values
parameters.name: body

get.description: Returns status of current connection

parameters.description: Parameters in body (consumer_id, provider_id, service_type) required for creating new connection
parameters.name: body

get.description: Returns current public IP address
Returns connection locations
Returns statistics about current connection
Returns the myst price in the given currency (dai is deprecated)
get.summary: Returns the myst price in the given currency

parameters.description: Currency to which myst is converted
parameters.name: currency

parameters.description: Report issue request
parameters.name: body

get.description: Returns health check information about client
Returns list of identities

post.description: Creates identity and stores in keystore encrypted with passphrase

parameters.description: Parameter in body (passphrase) required for creating new identity
parameters.name: body

post.description: Imports a given identity returning it is a blob of text which can later be used to import it back.

parameters.description: Parameter in body used to import an identity.
parameters.name: body

put.description: Tries to retrieve the last used identity, the first identity, or creates and returns a new identity

parameters.description: Parameter in body (passphrase) required for creating new identity
parameters.name: body

get.description: Provide identity details

parameters.description: hex address of identity
parameters.name: id

get.description: Provides beneficiary address for given identity

parameters.description: hex address of identity
parameters.name: id

get.description: Gets all orders for a given identity from the pilvytis service

parameters.description: Identity for which to get orders
parameters.name: id

post.description: Takes the given data and tries to create a new payment order in the pilvytis service.

parameters.description: Identity for which to create an order
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Required data to create a new order
parameters.name: body

get.description: Gets an order for a given identity and order id combo from the pilvytis service

parameters.description: Identity for which to get an order
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Order id
parameters.name: order_id

get.description: Gets a referral token for the given identity if a campaign exists

parameters.description: Identity for which to get a token
parameters.name: id

get.description: Verifies user's eligibility and the presence of an applicable public campaign
get.summary: Checks if the user can obtain a referral token

parameters.description: Identity for which to get a token
parameters.name: id

post.description: Registers identity on Mysterium Network smart contracts using Transactor

parameters.description: Identity address to register
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: all body parameters a optional
parameters.name: body

get.description: Provides registration status for given identity, if identity is not registered - provides additional data required for identity registration

parameters.description: hex address of identity
parameters.name: id

put.description: Uses passphrase to decrypt identity stored in keystore

parameters.description: Identity stored in keystore
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Parameter in body (passphrase) required for unlocking identity
parameters.name: body

get.description: Returns original locations

parameters.description: api_key field
parameters.name: body

delete.description: Clears MMN's API key from config
delete.summary: Clears MMN's API key from config

get.description: Returns node report from MMN
returns MMN's API key
NAT status returns the last known NAT traversal status

200.description: NAT status ("not_finished"/"successful"/"failed") and optionally error if status is "failed"

get.description: Gets all possible currencies that can be used for payments
get.summary: Get all possible currencies for payments

get.description: Includes minimum amount of myst required when topping up and suggested amounts
Returns list of proposals filtered by provider id

parameters.description: id of provider proposals
parameters.name: provider_id

parameters.description: the service type of the proposal. Possible values are "openvpn", "wireguard" and "noop"
parameters.name: service_type

parameters.description: the access policy id to filter the proposals by
parameters.name: access_policy

parameters.description: the access policy source to filter the proposals by
parameters.name: access_policy_source

parameters.description: If given will filter proposals by node location country.
parameters.name: country

parameters.description: IP Type (residential, datacenter, etc.).
parameters.name: ip_type

parameters.description: Minimum compatibility level of the proposal.
parameters.name: compatibility_min

parameters.description: Maximum compatibility level of the proposal.
parameters.name: compatibility_max

parameters.description: Minimum quality of the provider.
parameters.name: quality_min

get.description: Returns proposal filter presets
ServiceList provides a list of running services on the node.

post.description: Provider starts serving new service to consumers

parameters.description: Parameters in body (providerID) required for starting new service
parameters.name: body

get.description: ServiceGet provides info for requested service on the node.
Returns list of sessions history filtered by given query

parameters.description: Number of items per page.
parameters.name: page_size

parameters.description: Page to filter the items by.
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: Filter the sessions from this date (now -30d, by default). Formatted in RFC3339 e.g. 2020-07-01.
parameters.name: date_from

parameters.description: Filter the sessions until this date (now, by default). Formatted in RFC3339 e.g. 2020-07-30.
parameters.name: date_to

parameters.description: Direction to filter the sessions by. Possible values are "Provided", "Consumed".
parameters.name: direction

parameters.description: Consumer identity to filter the sessions by.
parameters.name: consumer_id

parameters.description: Hermes ID to filter the sessions by.
parameters.name: hermes_id

parameters.description: Provider identity to filter the sessions by.
parameters.name: provider_id

parameters.description: Service type to filter the sessions by.
parameters.name: service_type

parameters.description: Status to filter the sessions by. Possible values are "New", "Completed".
parameters.name: status

get.description: Returns list of session connectivity status

parameters.description: Filter the sessions from this date (now -30d, by default). Formatted in RFC3339 e.g. 2020-07-01.

get.description: Returns settlement history

parameters.description: Number of items per page.
parameters.name: page_size

parameters.description: Page to filter the items by.
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: Filter the settlements from this date. Formatted in RFC3339 e.g. 2020-07-01.

parameters.name: date_to

parameters.description: Provider identity to filter the sessions by.

get.description: Return an object with the current terms config

post.description: Takes the given data and tries to update terms agreement config.

parameters.description: Required data to update terms
parameters.name: body

get.description: Returns fees applied by Transactor

post.description: Forces a settlement for the hermes promises. Does not wait for completion.
post.summary: forces the settlement of promises for the given provider and hermes

parameters.description: settle request body
parameters.name: body

post.description: Forces a settlement for the hermes promises and blocks until the settlement is complete.
post.summary: forces the settlement of promises for the given provider and hermes

parameters.description: settle request body
parameters.name: body

post.description: Asks to perform withdrawal to l1.
post.summary: Asks to perform withdrawal to l1.

parameters.description: withdraw request body
parameters.name: body

post.description: Decreases stake on eth blockchain via the mysterium transactor.

parameters.description: decrease stake request
parameters.name: body

post.description: Forces a settlement with stake increase for the hermes promises and does not block.
post.summary: forces the settlement with stake increase of promises for the given provider and hermes.

parameters.description: settle request body
parameters.name: body

post.description: Forces a settlement with stake increase for the hermes promises and blocks until the settlement is complete.
post.summary: forces the settlement with stake increase of promises for the given provider and hermes.

parameters.description: settle request body
parameters.name: body

AccessPolicy.description: AccessPolicy represents the access controls for proposal

AuthRequest.title: AuthRequest request used to authenticate to API.

AuthResponse.title: AuthResponse response after successful authentication to API.

BeneficiaryTxStatus.title: BeneficiaryTxStatus settle with beneficiary transaction status.

ChangePasswordRequest.title: ChangePasswordRequest request used to change API password.

kill_switch.description: kill switch option restricting communication only through VPN

ConnectionCreateRequestDTO.title: ConnectionCreateRequest request used to start a connection.

service_type.description: service type. Possible values are "openvpn", "wireguard" and "noop"

ConnectionDTO.title: ConnectionDTO holds full consumer connection details.

ConnectionInfoDTO.title: ConnectionInfoDTO holds partial consumer connection details.

throughput_received.description: Download speed in bits per second

throughput_sent.description: Upload speed in bits per second

CurrencyExchangeDTO.title: CurrencyExchangeDTO the value of a given currency.

DNSOption.description: DNSOption defines DNS server selection strategy for consumer

DecreaseStakeRequest.description: DecreaseStakeRequest represents the decrease stake request

Error.description: Error represents a single error in an ErrorResponse

FieldErrorMap.description: FieldErrorMap represents a map of field name and corresponding list of errors for that field

FilterPreset.title: FilterPreset is a pre-defined proposal filter.

IdentityBeneficiaryResponseDTO.title: IdentityBeneficiaryResponse represents the provider beneficiary address.

IdentityCreateRequestDTO.title: IdentityCreateRequest request used for new identity creation.

IdentityCurrentRequestDTO.title: IdentityCurrentRequest request used for current identity remembering.

IdentityImportRequest.title: IdentityImportRequest is received in identity import endpoint.

IdentityRegisterRequestDTO.description: IdentityRegisterRequest represents the identity registration user input parameters

referral_token.description: Token: referral token, if the user has one

IdentityRegistrationResponseDTO.description: IdentityRegistrationResponse represents registration status and needed data for registering of given identity

registered.description: Returns true if identity is registered in payments smart contract

IdentityUnlockRequestDTO.title: IdentityUnlockRequest request used for identity unlocking.

Int.description:
Operations always take pointer arguments (*Int) rather
than Int values, and each unique Int value requires
its own unique *Int pointer. To "copy" an Int value,
an existing (or newly allocated) Int must be set to
a new value using the Int.Set method; shallow copies
of Ints are not supported and may lead to errors.
Int.title:
An Int represents a signed multi-precision integer.
The zero value for an Int represents the value 0.

ListProposalFilterPresetsResponse.title: ListProposalFilterPresetsResponse holds a list of proposal filter presets.

MMNApiKeyRequest.title: MMNApiKeyRequest request used to manage MMN's API key.

NATStatusDTO.description: NATStatusDTO gives information about NAT traversal success or failure

page.description: The current page of the items.

total_pages.description: The last page of the items.

PaymentChannelDTO.title: PaymentChannelDTO represents represents opened payment channel between identity and hermes.

PaymentOrderOptions.description: PaymentOrderOptions represents pilvytis payment order options

ReferralTokenResponse.title: ReferralTokenResponse represents a response for referral token.

ServiceAccessPolicies.description: ServiceAccessPolicies represents the access controls for service start

options.description: options with which service was started. Every service has a unique list of allowed options.

type.description: service type. Possible values are "openvpn", "wireguard" and "noop"

ServiceListResponse.title: ServiceListResponse represents a list of running services on the node.

ServiceStartRequestDTO.title: ServiceStartRequest request used to start a service.

options.description: service options. Every service has a unique list of allowed options.

type.description: service type. Possible values are "openvpn", "wireguard" and "noop"

ServiceStatisticsDTO.description: ServiceStatisticsDTO shows the successful and attempted connection count

SessionListResponse.title: SessionListResponse defines session list representable as json.

page.description: The current page of the items.

total_pages.description: The last page of the items.

SessionStatsAggregatedResponse.title: SessionStatsAggregatedResponse defines aggregated sessions stats response as json.

SessionStatsDTO.title: SessionStatsDTO represents the session aggregated statistics.

SessionStatsDailyResponse.title: SessionStatsDailyResponse defines session stats representable as json.

SettleRequestDTO.description: SettleRequest represents the request to settle hermes promises

SettleState.description: SettleState represents the state of settle with beneficiary transaction

SettlementListResponse.title: SettlementListResponse defines settlement list representable as json.

page.description: The current page of the items.

total_pages.description: The last page of the items.

TermsRequest.title: TermsRequest object is accepted by terms endpoints.

TermsResponse.title: TermsResponse object is returned by terms endpoints.

WithdrawRequestDTO.title: WithdrawRequest represents the request to withdraw earnings to l1.
